title: Cartridge gaming is back! - Evercade EXP
description: Thanks to Secret Lab for sponsoring today's video! Check them out at   Cartridges are cool, but is the gimmick cool enough to justify putting on a handheld in 2023? Anthony is here to find out! The Evercade EXP uses the same cartridges as its console sibling, but the performance might not be able to keep up with newer ways of emulating...
